metadata.title: CVE-2024-26769 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:nvmet-fc: avoid deadlock on delete association path When deleting anassociation the shutdown path is deadlocking because we try to flush thenvmet_wq nested. Avoid this by deadlock by deferring the put work into itsown work item.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
